moving

Class Message

  • java.lang.Object
    • moving.Message
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    UnlockedMessage

    public class Message
extends java.lang.Object
    Displays and updates the in-game messages.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Message

        public Message(java.lang.String text,
       boolean textOnRight,
       java.awt.Image img)
        Default constructor.
        Parameters:
        text - The text that the message will display.
        textOnRight - Whether the text is on the right or the left. (If text is on right, the picture will be on the left, and vice-versa)
        img - The picture that will be displayed as the person or thing that is saying the message.

    • Method Detail

      • updateMessage

        public void updateMessage(java.lang.Object ref)
        Updates the message and what exactly it should display. Gets the graphics from the Object that is passed in (it will either be a MenuScreen or a Game).
        Parameters:
        ref - The Object to receive Graphics data from.

      • drawMessage

        public void drawMessage(java.awt.Graphics g)
        Draws the message.
        Parameters:
        g - The object on which the graphics is drawn.

      • removeBasedOnType

        public void removeBasedOnType()
        A special method that is created for the UnlockedMessage class to override. Details are in the UnlockedMessage class.
